title: This missing feature has FINALLY made it to Steam Deck! (Plus other Deck news)

media:group.media:title: This missing feature has FINALLY made it to Steam Deck! (Plus other Deck news)
media:group.media:description:
The Steam Deck is now available for general purchase. No waiting in a queue. No reservation. Just go buy it. Now they need to start selling it at brick and mortar retail.


The Reddit post in question: https://www.reddit.com/r/SteamDeck/comments/xuqdaq/steam_deck_reservation_took_1_day/
Order a Steam Deck: https://store.steampowered.com/steamdeck
Google's closing down Stadia: https://www.theverge.com/2022/9/30/23381106/google-stadia-shutdown-shocked-developers-too
That time I predicted Google was going to close down Stadia "in a few years": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sg8eSno5gnk&t=790s
Google's poor track record of services: https://killedbygoogle.com/
Destiny 2 subreddit post: https://www.reddit.com/r/DestinyTheGame/comments/xuonok/focused_feedback_linux_and_alternative_platform/
Steam Deck and SteamOS Updates: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/1675200/view/3301726014486703380

My second channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnuvP0behGQMR5Wd3l80IWg

# What are your machines specs?
Office Rig:
 * AMD Ryzen 7 1800x
 * MSI Pro Series X370 SLI PLUS
 * AMD RX VEGA 64
 * GSkill Ripjaw V DDR4 8GB x4 (32 GB)
 * Fractal Design Define R9 Case
 * Manjaro GNOME

Living Room Gaming Rig:
 * ASUS X99-E-10G WS
 * Intel Core i7-6900K @ 3.2GHz
 * NVidia Titan X (Pascal)
 * DDR4 Corsair Vengeance RGB 8GB x8 (64GB)

Backup Rig
* System76 Thelio Minor
* AMD Ryzen 5 3400G
* DDR4 16GB RAM
* Zotac Nvidia GTX 970 4GB

Home Server:
 * ASUS M5A78L-M/USB3
 * AMD FX 6300 at 3.5 GHz
 * Nvidia GTX 750 1GB
 * DDR3 20 GB RAM
